short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage your bookmarks with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Duckbase (Chrome) Extension let you bookmark webpages, where the content gets added to your knowledge base (Duckbase). You can add all your previously made bookmarks by pressing the Duckbase Extension icon, and then press the ‘add’ button. Depending on the amount of bookmarks you have, this can take a few minutes before they are added into Duckbase.
You can also bookmark webpages on the fly and the content will get added to your knowledge base (Duckbase).
